overview:
Nitin is responsible for building business partnerships with Travel Content & Service providers for iXiGO.com

He has been closely associated with Travel Management companies, consolidators, aggregators / international content suppliers for multiple products and have detailed understanding of the Travel Distribution industry. With an extensive background in GDS and Travel Technology companies’ Strategy and Business Development departments, he packs in 10 years of hands on experience in the Travel Industry.

His rich experience enables him to think out of the box and believes in building and maintaining long term mutually beneficial partnerships with Travel Content & Service providers globally.
